home.title: Test Sessions

testSession.name: Name

help.name: name of this SMSCaccount account
help.testSetup: Choose the Test Setup associate with this Test session
help.trafficFile: A CSV file contain traffic template used for send message out
help.patternVariant: Pattern Variant to apply on this traffic template

variants.stressTest: Run as fast as it can
variants.trafficReduction: Reduce traffic based on Min and Max ratio
variants.timestampShift: Increase or decrease the timestamp on Traffic Template before send out
variants.speedVariation: Increase or decreate the send out speed on a random value between the defined range
